channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- The Sorter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- The Sorter

item.title: CVE-2021-24399|2024-08-03T19:28:23.861Z -- unknown -- the%20sorter
item.description: The check_order function of The Sorter WordPress plugin through 1.0 uses an `area_id` parameter which is not sanitised, escaped or validated before inserting to a SQL statement, leading to SQL injection.
